name: McKinney
description: At McKinney, you'll find a group of creatively driven, passionate people who are obsessed with results. This means that we have no "McKinney style” — our work solves the challenge in front of us, however it needs to be done. And as a freestanding agency operating independently within the Cheil Worldwide network, we have access to the resources of 49 offices in 44 countries to make that work.
